startingHalite.description: The starting amount of halite available on the board.

size.description: The number of cells vertically and horizontally on the board.

spawnCost.description: The amount of halite to spawn a new ship.

convertCost.description: The number of ships required to create a shipyard.

moveCost.description: The percent deducted from ship's current halite per move.

collectRate.description: The rate of halite collected by a fleet from a cell each cell.

regenRate.description: The rate halite regenerates on the board.

maxCellHalite.description: The maximum halite that can be in any cell.

randomSeed.description: The seed used to initialize the random number generator.

agentTimeout.description: Obsolete field kept for backwards compatibility, please use observation.remainingOverageTime.

reward.description: The amount of player owned halite (equal to players[index][0]) if the player has not been eliminated, else step_eliminated - episode_steps - 1.

halite.description: Serialized list of available halite per cell on the board.

players.description: List of players and their assets.

items.description: Halite: The amount player owned halite (equal to reward).
Shipyards: The list of player owned shipyards.

additionalProperties.description: Key: uid of the asset (shipyard). Value: position (row * size + column)

items.description: Ship Count: The number of ships in the shipyard.
Turns Controlled: The number of turns this team has owned this shipyard.
Fleets: The list of player owned fleets.
Ship Halite: The amount present in a ship.
Ship Count: The number of ships in the fleet.
Direction: The direction the fleet is going in

action.description: Actions taken per asset (fleet or shipyard).

additionalProperties.description: Key: uid of the asset. Value: action. SPAWN for shipyards, remaining for ships.
